document_data.name: Fiirnel'ther Vandree
document_data.mainbody: '''Fiirnel'ther Vandree''' was the [[matron mother]] of [[House Vandree]] in [[Menzoberranzan]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: She and her house were considered even by drow standards to be vicious and vengeful, as well as ambitious.
document_data.History:
She killed her mother and previous matron mother [[Troken'ther Vandree]] in the {{YearlinkName|1388}}. Under Fiinel'ther's guidance, the Vandree rose quickly to become the eighth house and thus a member of the [[Ruling Council]].

She was still in power by around [[1486 DR]].
